alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:50PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Umatilla, west central Union and north central Grant Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 250 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dale, or 34 miles southeast of Heppner, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ukiah, Lehman Hot Springs and Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
